title: I know that my Redeemer lives

verses.text: I know that my Redeemer lives, And ever prays for me; A token of his love he gives, A pledge of liberty.
I find him lifting up my head, He brings salvation near; His presence makes me free indeed, And he will soon appear.
He wills that I should holy be; To meet thee from above; Thy goodness thankfully I see, And now I taste thy love.
When God is mine, and I am his, Of Paradise possessed, I taste unutterable bliss, And everlasting rest.
